name: Pepporoni Pizza
description: This gourmet pizza is ideal for easy late night delivery, complete with mozzarella cheese and pepperoni.

name: Supreme Pizza
description: Enjoy this freshly prepared pizza including pepperoni, seasoned pork, beef, mushrooms, green bell peppers and red onions.

name: Cheese Pizza
description: With 50% more mozzarella cheese, Garlic Parmesan sauce, and a toasted Parmesan crust, this is surely the cheesiest of cheese pizzas.

name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
description: A BBQ pizza topped with grilled chicken, bacon and red onion? Sign us up!
